name: Judge Dee - The City God Case
name_original: Judge Dee - The City God Case
description:
A strange mystery is hovering over the small town of Wu Ling. Even as the population is struck by the curse of the God of the City, the mayor's son, Chen, is found dead on his birthday. Everyone turns to the famous Judge Dee in the hopes he can solve the mystery and put an end to the fate that has befallen them.

Play the role of Judge Dee, the great investigator, and solve many puzzles in this hidden objects adventure game with a unique atmosphere!
Game in English.

- A world with exceptional graphics
- 40 locations to explore
- 30 hidden object scenes
- 25 puzzles to solve

1 player
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080p
DUALSHOCK®3
PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move navigation controller or Wireless Controller optional.
